title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.98 - Expenditure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.98 - Expenditure

State Regulations
(a) The incurring
of a liability, the payment of cash or the transfer of property for the purpose
of acquiring an asset or service or settling a loss. (b) The amount of cash or property paid or to
be paid for a service rendered, or an asset purchased. (c) Any cost, the benefits of which may
extend beyond the current accounting period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.98

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
